chinese: 巴比特兴高采烈，男子气概十足。

english: He looked at her with masculine approval .
chinese: 他以一种男子气概欣赏地看着她。
我是一个很有男子气概的人。

english: Mannish turkish women veiled their stern faces .
chinese: 颇有男子气概的土耳其妇女，用面纱蒙着她们那冷森森的脸。

english: I will never engage myself to one who has no manly independence .
chinese: 我永远不会爱上一个没有男子气概，不能自立的人。
男子气概造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: She was really fond of his strength, his wholesome looks, his manliness .
chinese: 她真喜欢他的坚强，他那健康的容貌，他的男子气概。

english: Whole ages of abuse and oppression cannot crush the manhood clear out of him .
chinese: 千百年的虐待与压迫，也不能把他的男子气概消磨得一干二净。

english: Then, and not till then, the man in her was vanished, and the woman in her resumed away .
chinese: 当时，并且在那以前她就丧失了她的男子气概，女人的本色又占了上风。

english: Our friends had changed of late, they all seemed to have grown stronger and better looking .
chinese: 我们的两位朋友近来都有点改变了，他们都长得更漂亮，而且更有男子气概了。

english: Compared with such as these, the savages of new guinea or the red indians are immensely higher in the scale of manhood .
chinese: 新几内亚野人或印第安人与这种人相比也显得有男子气概得多了。

english: The men of the julii are masculine men
chinese: 我们优利亚家族的男人都是非常有男子气概的

english: Ruggedly good - looking in a manly - man sort of way
chinese: 从男子气概来说，乍一看长得不错。

english: Huh ? not a very manly thing to do , is it
chinese: 啊?那并不是一件很有男子气概的事情?对吧

english: Well , it sounds very manly . do you wear a hardhat
chinese: 听起来很有男子气概你戴安全帽吗？

english: He thinks it ' s macho to drink a lot and get into fights
chinese: 他认为酗酒斗殴就是男子气概
